description: This is a Java Spring Boot REST controller named DemoSecureController, providing protected endpoints for testing JWT authentication and role-based access control (RBAC). It includes public, user, and admin endpoints with different access restrictions.

classes.name: DemoSecureController
classes.description: A REST controller providing demo endpoints for verifying JWT authentication and RBAC capabilities.

methods.name: publicEndpoint
methods.description: Returns a simple string indicating public access, accessible without authentication.

methods.name: userEndpoint
methods.description: Returns a string for authenticated users with USER or ADMIN roles.

methods.name: adminEndpoint
methods.description: Returns a string for authenticated users with ADMIN role.
